channel.title: Athena on Dataware Logistics
channel.description: Recent content in Athena on Dataware Logistics

item.title: AWS Redshift Spectrum, Athena, and S3: Everything You Need to Know
item.description: Hey everyone, today I would like to present you how to explore your raw data stored by AWS S3 by using AWS managed analytical managed services. Today we will cover both AWS Redshift Spectrum and AWS Athena on our tutorial. One of the significant challenges to data-driven companies comes when integrating different application systems. Major public cloud providers, such as Amazon Web Services or Google Cloud Platform, offer robust products that are ready for your analytics needs.
